SELECT tt.id, tt.tour_id as tourId, tt.tour_title as tourTitle, tt.tour_digest as tourDigest, tt.tour_main_body as tourMainBody, tt.tour_pic as tourPic, tt.comments_id as commentsId, atc.type_name as tourAreaName, atc1.type_name as tourCountryName, tt.tour_giveALike as tourGiveALike, tt.create_time as createTime, tt.update_time as updateTime FROM tour_tb tt left join all_type_config atc on tt.tour_area_id=atc.type_id
left join all_type_config atc1 on tt.tour_contry_id=atc1.type_id
tt.tour_id=#{tourId}
and tt.tour_contry_id=1
and tt.tour_contry_id=2
order by tt.tour_giveALike desc
order by tt.create_time desc
